name: W.K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
sampleDescriptions: Self-defense lobbying to oppose provisions in H.R. 1 that would undermine the W.K. Kellogg Foundations organizational standing and ability to carry out its mission, as permitted under Section 4945(e)
